text: » Kohlberg proposes 3 stages of moral development: » 1) Preconventional Morality: emphasis on compliance with rules to avoid punishment and gain rewards > 2) Conventional Morality: emphasis on conformity to rules that are defined by others’ approval or society’s rules » 3) Postconventional Morality: emphasis on moral reasoning based on individual principles and conscience
